text: Mar Emmanuel III Delly (26 October 1927 - 8 April 2014) was an Iraqi Catholic leader. He was the Patriarch Emeritus of Babylon of the Chaldeans and former Primate of the Chaldean Catholic Church. His name in Arabic is . In Syriac it is . He was born in Tel Keppe. Delly died on 8 April 2014 at a hospital in San Diego, California in the United States. He was 86 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Emmanuel III Delly at Catholic Hierarchy.org Category:1927 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Eastern Catholic bishops Category:Iraqi Christian clergy Category:Patriarchs
title: Emmanuel III Delly
